TASK: Craft an item of type: nether_wart_block
inventory=[{"type": "cyan_stained_glass", "quantity": 32, "index": 12}, {"type": "music_disc_mall", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "orange_tulip", "quantity": 54, "index": 23}, {"type": "chorus_flower", "quantity": 57, "index": 25}, {"type": "dark_oak_stairs", "quantity": 32, "index": 27}, {"type": "wheat", "quantity": 56, "index": 29}, {"type": "zoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 35, "index": 33}, {"type": "end_crystal", "quantity": 34, "index": 38}, {"type": "nether_wart", "quantity": 9, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft nether_wart_block, I need to place 9 nether_wart items in a 3x3 grid. First I will move one nether_wart item to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 1 with quantity 1
